metadata.title: CVE-2018-19532 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
A NULL pointer dereference vulnerability exists in the functionPdfTranslator::setTarget() in pdftranslator.cpp of PoDoFo 0.9.6, whilecreating the PdfXObject, as demonstrated by podofoimpose. It allows anattacker to cause Denial of Service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-19532` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libpodofo-utils - 0.9.6+dfsg-5
libpodofo0.9.8 - 0.9.6+dfsg-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.9.6+dfsg-5').
